trans-unit.source: Organizes styles that will be applied to other controls.
trans-unit.target: 組織會套用到其他控制項的樣式。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示已剖析的項目。

trans-unit.source: the object to be added does not have a Name attribute.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的物件沒有名稱屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified alignment for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定的對齊樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: For possible values, see <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Alignment%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Alignment%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value specifying the alignment for the style.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值，指定樣式的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The Alignment property was accessed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段存取的對齊屬性。

trans-unit.source: -or- An attempt was made to set the property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-嘗試設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other properties, the BackColor property is not inherited from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 不同於其他屬性，BackColor 屬性不被繼承自其父代。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the BackColor property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit the background color of cyan.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果父控制項的 BackColor 屬性設青色中，子控制項不會繼承青色的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set the child control's BackColor property to cyan, or you must set the BackColor property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control.
trans-unit.target: 您必須明確設定子控制項的 BackColor 屬性為青色、 或者您必須將父控制項的 BackColor 屬性設定並套用至子控制項的樣式表。

trans-unit.source: This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.
trans-unit.target: 這是與階層式樣式表的行為一致。

trans-unit.source: The specified background color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 指定的背景色彩樣式。

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property was accessed at run time.
trans-unit.target: BackColor 屬性已在執行階段存取。

trans-unit.source: -or- An attempt was made to set the property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-嘗試設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that determines whether an additional trailing break is rendered after the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，決定控制項之後是否呈現其他尾端分行符號。

trans-unit.source: This break causes subsequent content to start on the next line.
trans-unit.target: 這個分行符號會使後續的內容下一行開始。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an additional trailing break is rendered after the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項之後, 呈現其他尾端分行符號否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The BreakAfter property was accessed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段存取 BreakAfter 屬性。

trans-unit.source: -or- An attempt was made to set the property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-嘗試設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: This method is not available in the read-only <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不適用於唯讀<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IObjectListFieldCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Clear method for all the classes where this method applies.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Clear 方法的所有類別，這個方法會套用。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Clear method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet> collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>, it clears all the choices in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如的清除方法<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet>集合清除所有的樣式，在集合中，或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection>，它會清除集合中的所有選項。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.DeviceSpecificChoiceCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.StyleSheet>

trans-unit.source: Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.
trans-unit.target: 將欄位加入至控制項的物件清單的變更資料繫結行為的欄位，會要求您一次將資料繫結至控制項。

trans-unit.source: Returns the default style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 傳回預設樣式表。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: The default style sheet supports a number of styles.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式表支援多個樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the server control persists its view state, and the view state of any child controls it contains, to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出伺服器控制項是否而言保持其檢視狀態，以及它包含要求的用戶端的任何子控制項的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the server control maintains its view state; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果伺服器控制項保持其檢視狀態。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo"></xref> object that contains font information about the control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.FontInfo"></xref>物件，其中包含有關控制項的字型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: The Font property was accessed at run time,
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，存取此字型屬性

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified foreground color for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣式的指定的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this property sets the color for the text.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這個屬性會設定文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: You can use the ForeColor property to display text in a different color.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的前景色彩屬性可在不同的色彩顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 前景<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ForeColor property was accessed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段存取的前景色彩屬性。

trans-unit.target: -或者-嘗試設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: The key used to identify the style.
trans-unit.target: 用來識別樣式的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style"></xref> object in the style sheet with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style"> </xref>具有指定名稱的樣式表中的物件。

trans-unit.target: 從所儲存的先前頁面要求還原檢視狀態資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.SaveViewState*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，代表要還原的控制項狀態。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to a user control (.ascx file).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者控制項 （.ascx 檔案） 的參考。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet on the page inherits the styles in a style sheet defined at the root level of the referenced user control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式表頁面上的會繼承在根層級參考的使用者控制項的樣式表中的樣式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the style sheet on the user control has a property named `Style1`, the page can access `Style1` as if it were in the style sheet on the page.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果使用者控制項的樣式表具有內容，名為`Style1`，網頁可以存取`Style1`就好像在頁面的樣式表中。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a user control (.ascx file).
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項 （.ascx 檔案） 的參考。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified style from the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 從樣式表中移除指定的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The name of the style to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的樣式名稱。

trans-unit.source: The specified style does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的樣式不存在。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器的時間後發生的檢視狀態變更的任何伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回伺服器控制項目前檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the StyleReference property must be the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Name%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: StyleReference 屬性的值必須是<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.Name%2A>

trans-unit.target: 在執行階段存取 StyleReference 屬性。

trans-unit.target: -或者-嘗試設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of styles in a style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 傳回樣式集合中的樣式表。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 導致加入伺服器控制項的檢視狀態變更追蹤，因此它們可以儲存在伺服器控制項的<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件是透過可存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState*>

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a server control is rendered as UI on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出伺服器控制項是否會轉譯為 UI 頁面上。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is visible on the page; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項是出現在頁面上。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specified wrapping mode for the style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣式的指定文繞圖模式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Wrapping"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 已過時。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式相關資訊，請參閱[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900)網站。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Wrapping%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Wrapping%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.Wrapping%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerated value that specifies the wrapping mode for the style.
trans-unit.target: 列舉的值，指定樣式的文繞圖模式。

trans-unit.source: Exception type
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況類型

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 狀況

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Exception>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception></xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The Wrapping property was accessed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段存取換行屬性。

trans-unit.source: -or- An attempt was made to set the property.
trans-unit.target: -或者-嘗試設定屬性。
